text: Built within the Kantar UK website. This project allowed users to add food items to a shopping basket, From this the political party they were most likely to vote for based on their basket. HTML CSS jQuery Knockoutjs and Highcharts
Nestle commitments interactive. filtered and animated HTML CSS jQuery and Highcharts.js
Parrallax, sticky nav, scrolly, Reponsive thingy. HTML CSS jQuery
RBS 'think outside the bank' internal website. Reponsive web site built with module based layouts. HTML CSS jQuery and Highcharts.js
Kantar US and China data visualisations of selected stories powered on the backend by umbraco cms and third party data api's. Frontend highcharts.js D3.js and twitter api.
Guardian Travel guides, google maps API, jQuery Knockout.js twitter bootstrap asp.net running a custom cms backend.
Front end development and responsive design implemented for the psoriassess patients website.
Re-factored old code base and implemented new design and functionality of the new web site. HTML5 CSS3 jQuery PHP
Ironpanda website rare design & build and crafted clean and semantic html5 css3 and Angularjs.

A Facebook app built using php mysql html css and jQuery.

The app was integrated into Three's facebook page via a tab. The competition was a major success and attracted 10K new likes in the first two weeks.

Link: Three facebook page

Henrietta Barnett School was built using html5 css3 and intergrated in to a asp cms (zoobuilder).

Link: Henrietta Barnett School

Early in 2011 the award winning Three blog had the design freshened up. I implemented the new designs into the orginal Wordpress template using css html and added social aspects including Twitter and YouTube feeds. This also required some custom widget development.

Link: Three blog

Telemetry website, html5 video custom js/jQuery for a unique website.

Link: Telemetry

A mini site created for Three mobile for a chance to win a free 'day out'. The site consisted of a simple quiz and form for the user to fill out. By using CSS3 media queries and responsive design ideas we were able to optimize the layout for smart phones and tablets.

Link: three website

Taking zoomedia's current layout and design of their website (zoobuilder) and blog (Wordpress). I added css3 media quires to create a responsive website and blog versions for smartphones and smaller screens.

Link: zoomedia's web site and blog

A Taste of Spain 2011 website. html css and intergrated in to a classic asp cms (zoobuilder)

Link: A Taste of Spain

Westminster Business Council built with html5, css3 and intergrated in to a asp cms (zoobuilder).

Westminster Business Council
